price: Hisabu yao haiko ila kwa Mola wao Mlezi, laiti mngeli tambua!.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Hapana wa kuwalipa kwa vitendo vyao na kazi zao ila Mola wangu Mlezi; kwani Yeye ndiye anaye yajua vyema ya undani wao. Kama nyinyi ni watu watambuzi mngeli tambua hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
